scene_description_enriched: The image is divided into four panels, each featuring a winged creature or an angel against a gold background with red patterned drapery. The top left panel depicts an eagle holding a scroll. The top right panel shows an angel with green wings, kneeling and holding a scroll. The bottom left panel displays a winged lion with blue wings, also holding a scroll. The bottom right panel features a winged ox holding a scroll. All figures have halos, indicating their sacred nature. The scrolls contain inscriptions, likely representing biblical texts or prophecies.
